description:
Visquez‘s Electrode participated in a Pokémon World Championships battle against Ash Ketchum. Visquez called it their squad`s greatest secret weapon and it is feared far and wide as it`s known as "The Bomb Ball." Its Ability is Aftermath which ended up blowing out a lot of the windows in the gym.
It was matched up against Ash`s Gengar and then Pikachu. A lot of challengers come to the gym with Ground-type moves and to deal with that, they trained Electrode to use Magnet Rise to control the battlefield. Despite defeating Ash`s Gengar, Pikachu was able to defeat it to win the match.
name: Marumine (Visquez)
